name: Testing Laboratories (Non–Medical)
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non–face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that provide non-medical testing services to other
businesses. Examples of such services include automobile testing,
calibration, and certification, food testing, forensic testing, product
and pollution testing, and industrial X-ray inspection services.
For medical testing laboratories, use MCC 8071.
